comments.comment: Hello everybody my name is Markiplier and welcome to Five Nights at Freddies, an indie horror game that you guys suggested in mass, and I saw that Yamimash played it and he said that it was really really good; so I‚Äôm very eager to see what is up - and that is a terrifying animatronic bear reads off script family pizzeria looking for security guard to work the night shift. Oh, 12:00 A.M, the first night. If I didn‚Äôt want to stay the first night, why would I stay any more than five? Why would I say anymore than two - hello. Okay...Hello? Hello - oh, ah I can‚Äôt move. That‚Äôs a creepy skull...There‚Äôs creepy things on the wall - Oh, hello. Phone Guy begins dialogue ‚ÄúHello, hello hello,‚Äù Hi! ‚ÄúUh, I wanted to record a message for you, to help you get settled in on your first night.‚Äù Eugh.. ‚ÄúUm, I actually worked in that office before you, and I‚Äôm finishing up my last week now as a matter of fact. So, I know it can be a bit overwhelming..‚Äù Euuagh..! ‚ÄúBut I‚Äôm here to tell you, there‚Äôs nothing to worry about,‚Äù Agh.. ‚ÄúYou‚Äôll do fine! So, let‚Äôs just focus on getting you through your first week..‚Äù Okay! Sounds go- ‚ÄúAh, let‚Äôs see..First there‚Äôs an introductory greeting from the company that I‚Äôm supposed to read - i-it‚Äôs kind of a legal thing, you know, ahm - ‚ÄòWelcome to Freddy Fazbear‚Äôs Pizza-‚Äù Okay ‚Äú‚Äò..A magical place for kids and grownups alike-‚Äù Mark wheezes indistinctly in the background Heheha.. ‚Äú..Where fantasy and fun come to life,‚Äù Eugha..! ‚Äú‚ÄùFreddy Fazbear entertainment is not responsible for damage to property or person, upon discovering that damage or death has occured, a missing person report will be filed within ninety days or as soon as property and premises had been thoroughly cleaned and bleached, and the carpet‚Äôs have been replaced,‚Äô blah blah blah - now that might sound bad, I know, but-‚Äù Yeah! ‚Äú-There‚Äôs really nothing to worry about! Uh, the animatronic characters here do get a bit quirky at night, but do I blame them? No, if I was forced to sing those same stupid songs for twenty years, and I never got a bath, I‚Äôd probably be a bit irritable at night too. So just remember, these characters hold a special place in the hearts of children, and you need show them a little respect, Right?‚Äù Okay! ‚Äú-Okay-‚Äù Ha-okay! ‚ÄúSo just be aware, the characters fo tend to wander a bit-‚Äù Nehaheugh- ‚ÄúThey‚Äôre one some kinda of free-roaming mode-‚Äù hehauhuhugh! ‚ÄúUhh.. Something about their servos locking up if they get turned off for two long,‚Äù Oohoohoo- ‚ÄúUh, they used to be allowed to walk around during the day, too, but then there was the bite of eighty-seven.‚Äù The bite..?! ‚ÄúYeah..‚Äù What bite?! ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs amazing that the human body can live without the frontal lobe,‚Äù Why?! ‚ÄúNow concerning your safety, the only real risk to you as the night watch here, if any, is the fact that these characters - if they happen to see you after hours, they probably won‚Äôt recognize you as a person-‚Äù Oh..Oh! ‚ÄúThey‚Äôll most likely see you as a metal endoskeleton without it‚Äôs costume on. Now, since that‚Äôs against the rules here at Freddy Fazbear‚Äôs pizza, they‚Äôll probably try tooo.. Forcefully stuff you inside a Freddy Fazbear suit.‚Äù Oh, I get it‚Ä¶ ‚ÄúUhm, now that wouldn‚Äôt be so bad if the suits themselves weren‚Äôt filled with cross-beams, wires, and animatronic devices-‚Äù Augh? ‚Äú‚ÄùEspecially around the facial area,‚Äù uh-huh.. ‚ÄúNow you can imagine how having your head forcefully pressed inside one of those can cause a bit of discomfort-‚Äù Yeah! ‚Äú-or death. ‚ÄúUh, the only parts of you that would get to see the light of day would be your eyeballs and teeth that pop out of the front of the mask-‚Äù Euah! Oh! Why? What happened? ‚ÄúNow, they didn‚Äôt tell you these things when you signed up, but hey! First day should be a breeze, I‚Äôll chat with you tomorrow, uh.. Check those cameras and remember to close the doors, but only if absolutely necessary.‚Äù That‚Äôs not good! ‚Äú*incomprehensible* because of the power. Now, goodnight!‚Äù Phone guy‚Äôs dialogue ends. Goodnight? Oooh no! Oh that‚Äôs bad! I understand what I need to do. I need to watch the cams so that they don‚Äôt come after m- startled gibberish - Ho hi! There you aaaaaare, pretty bunny thiing‚Ä¶ Ooh-kay, okay, okay, I get it, I get it, I get it- where‚Äôd you go- You‚Äôre still there? Alright, you stay there. I don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs good that you‚Äôre staring at me - Oh my god, I thought it was weird that it couldn‚Äôt move, but this is totally different brief pause than any horror game I‚Äôve ever played. So, what you gotta do incase you‚Äôre not getting it, is you gotta watch pause to take a breath the cameras to make sure they don‚Äôt come by, while you gotta watch power. Is he still there..? Hi, you‚Äôre still there - wait a minute, what? Did you move? Ok-ie, you didn‚Äôt move. You don‚Äôt move neither. You don‚Äôt move nothin‚Äô! Don‚Äôt see ya movin‚Äô, I don‚Äôt wanna see anything.. Hohoh, my god! This Is terrifying! Why do I leave the doors open, why isn‚Äôt there enough power? Hi, okay you moved again. Hi, what‚Äôre you doing there? Might be gettin‚Äô a little close to mee.. Uh oh, oh, oh no.. Oh no, no! No, no no no, noo no no no eughh! Close it, ngahh! Hagh, don‚Äôt look at me! Okay, you‚Äôre over there, alright.. It‚Äôs okay! Why can‚Äôt I even have enough power for lights? takes a breath stay right there, you douchebag! You stay right - aff, there! another audible breath ..God damn it! That is like this is like the most terrifying game I‚Äôve ever played! Ugh, they‚Äôre gonna pop out at me! Oh, god he‚Äôs gone - hi, okay you‚Äôre just gonna alternate between the two places, it‚Äôs totally fine, your other friends.. They ain‚Äôt movin‚Äô.. softly They ain‚Äôt move much.. I see where I am, you‚Äôre not near me! So that‚Äôs good.. Just gonna pauses briefly periodically check How much longer do I need - I need less ‚Äòtil six A.M, am I gonna have enough power? And if I run out of power am I able to get by? Oh god‚Ä¶ You stay right there! Why am I still using some power? Oooh, god.. Seriously I‚Äôm gibberish - This is like, this is like‚Ä¶ Bad! You‚Äôre still there, kay - this is the first night! They said it should be easy the first night so I‚Äôm only assuming one of em‚Äô is gonna be wandering around and its just the creepy bunny guy. Happy fun time at Freddies Fun Land.. Havin‚Äô such a wonderful time.. Still there? Okay, you‚Äôre still there! I‚Äôm gonna name you Bunny pause Baaalliday oh, god where‚Äôd he go?! He‚Äôs here! Hooh! Where‚Äôd he go? Hi again, okay.. You stay right thaff - there! And I don‚Äôt have to deal with you! ..Probably shouldn‚Äôt do that, I need to conserve power! God dammit that was like.. Half the damn thing, the doors were down! ..Still there? softly hookay, okay, ookay.. Heheuhahahaha..*faint tune begins playing* I hear that! ...I hear that! Oh god! Where‚Äôs the other one? Where is he? Eagh! Euugh! Whereishe? Where‚Äôd he go? Where‚Äôd he go, where‚Äôd he go? Where are both of them? Bothofem‚Äô- Hi, you‚Äôre really close to meee.. Oh god, it‚Äôs not six A.M. yet? Hi, okay, so I think I just need to keep the left door closed.. Mark makes faint noises of panic that gradually grow in volume uhh, hehauhaha! Uhh, uhuh - Not okay, not okay! Is he behind that door? No? Where‚Äôd he go? Where‚Äôd he AH! Oh, hi, hi! Hi, hi, hi, hi, okay, okay, I don‚Äôt have much power left. What‚Äôre you gonna do? Is the other one still there? Ngh! ambient noise rings out ..Hi! Ooh, you moved again! Where, where, where where‚Ä¶ Heehuhahaha! What do I do? What do I do? Oooooh, you‚Äôre still right behind that dohoor.. Hoo what happens if I open the door? Imma run out of power! Ooh, Imma run out of power! Ishethere? gibberish that gives way to wheezing ensues I don‚Äôt wanna die! Aaah, 1 percent power! gasps for air doors come up and an ambient effect is triggered as the power goes out ingame AH! Ooh no..! Oh no.. Noo, no no no no no no no! Oh, no no nono no.. a jingle begins to play as Mark stares at the screen in fear, soon noticing the blinking eyes of the games mascot HI! OH, GOD DAMMIT! HOW ARE YOU DOING? jingle changes as the dialogue ‚Äú6 AM‚Äù is put on screen Did I make it? Mark spews gibberish and throws his arms up, gasping for air Yeah! Oh god, not again! Why would I do this? gibberish my job? deep breath ookay, okay. So I ran out of power -but, phone rings oh hi, hi again. Do you have an se sage advice for me? Yep, kay, yep. I know, yep, yep yep yep. What can I do for you? phone continues to ring I know! Phone guy‚Äôs dialogue plays once again oh god..‚ÄùHello, hello! Uh, well if you‚Äôre hearing this you made it to day two! Uh, congrats!‚Äù wheezes briefly hehe! ‚ÄúI won‚Äôt talk quite as long this time, since Freddy and his friends tend to become more active as the week progresses.‚Äù whispered what? ‚ÄúUh, it might be a good idea to peek at those cameras while I talk, just to make sure everyone‚Äôs in their proper place-‚Äù No.. ‚ÄúUh, interestingly enough, Freddy himself doesn‚Äôt come off stage very often, I‚Äôve heard he becomes a lot more active in the dark though, so hey, I guess that‚Äôs one more reason not to run out of power, right?‚Äù Aeugh! ‚ÄúUh - I also want to emphasize the importance of using your door light - uh, there are blind spots in your camera view, and those blind spots happen to be right outside your doors, so if you can‚Äôt find something, or someone on your cameras, make sure-‚Äù Eugh!‚Äù to check the door light. Uh, you might only have a few seconds to react -uh, not that you would be in any danger, of course. Uh, far from that. Also, uhh, check on the curtain in Pirate Cove from time to time, the character in there seems to be weakened and becomes more active if the cameras remain off for long periods of time.    EDIT: THXXXX FOR 728 LIKES
